channel.title: Staff & unneeded staff on our website
channel.description:
[b]Staff members, please don't take this as any disrespect, I'm just expression what i feel needs to be said, this is for MoparScape Moderators, not Global Moderator(s) that frequent the website such as[/b] [b]Taharok[/b]
I have nothing but the utmost respect for all of the staff team but lately i have been noticing a lot of rule breakers and no moderators are to be found. it sucks when you can't do anything to get rid of them. Not to be an asshole, but those RSC moderators had no business being promoted if all they do is moderate the RSC section (which they were already sectionals of)
The RSC moderators were already doing their job fine in their own section. Why should they take up spaces for other members of this forum that would actually moderate other sections?
I always check the staff list, i make sure i always see who our new moderators are, as well as our announcements section. You can see the list + punishments here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338737.0.html
[b]Ry60003333[/b] - I remember him back in the day when he started moderating, he didn't do quite a lot (but he was rightfully intelligent and would always make the right choices in moderation, i guess that's why he's still here today.) His last post was on
[b]Sept 18.[/b]
[b]Si Force [/b] - Excellent moderator and has done a lot for this site (having computer problems, that's normal but he at least made an effort on telling the rest of the community that he has problems)
[b]SilentCJ [/b] - Very good moderator and has always done his job well, no complaints here.)
[b]Fat Cookies[/b] - No complaints here, excellent.
[b]Frell[/b] - Don't see a lot of him anymore, usually on mitb (good moderator)
[b]Evil_[/b] - Good guy, always had good conversations with. (Doesn't frequent moparscape very much anymore, very busy)
[b]Newty[/b] - Gained a lot of anger for the members towards the website and didn't visit moparscape very much anymore.
[b]The Reaper X [/b] - Good moderator, no complaints.
[b]KO9[/b] - Not a bad staff member, but NEVER goes on any other boards besides RSC
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2po6qvr.jpg[/img]
KO9 has more posts in the Linux board on MITB than he does on any board on MoparScape combined (besides RSC sections)
[b]Peeter[/b] - The same as above.
[b]If you don't have the decency to post without being rude or rude accusations, please don't post. The reason i am posting this is so we can do our best as a community to problem solve and figure out solutions to problems within our forum, MoparScape is NOT a small community, so we all need to do our best to make sure we can problem solve correctly. [/b]

item.title: Staff & unneeded staff on our website
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:100, topic:364336”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=460555.msg3372032#msg3372032 date=1287307704]

And a trolling faggot. I know all the nicknames. But even while trolling and spamming I did report people when kihomura was a moderator now adays I just don’t because I see no point to.(also I only troll and spam on moparscape, other forums I don’t)

so wait you break the rules and report others for breaking the rules?
[/quote]I use to explain the rules in a trolling manor so they could understand them easier, then I would report them yes. Now a days why even report? I never seem to see how it does any good.[/quote]

Well when a report is sent in we will deal with it, and whether or not it changes the user reported for the better is up to them. We just look at the reports and take whatever action is necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff & unneeded staff on our website
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:95, topic:364336”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=460555.msg3371943#msg3371943 date=1287294163]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=460555.msg3371942#msg3371942 date=1287294089]

I wantz Kihomura back >.<

Rich, Tico and Taharok were the best moderators of MoparScape.
[/quote]Well Taharoks was the one who banned me for like a week or 2 for spamming, so he is good. Only thing bad after that I ever got was a week mute.

Any staff member that realizes you need a mute is a good staff member.
You’re no Lewk or AMERIKA, but you are a spamming moron.
[/quote]And a trolling faggot. I know all the nicknames. But even while trolling and spamming I did report people when kihomura was a moderator now adays I just don’t because I see no point to.(also I only troll and spam on moparscape, other forums I don’t)[/quote]

I think this is a prime example that can be used to explain the condition of this site, as well as the need for more staff members. We deal with a lot of shit, most of it we don’t even want to deal with. More staff members means more people do less work individually, it’s a good system.

Staff is never unneeded here, but can sometimes be harmful. Seeing as this is rare, we don’t really need to consider it. As for being unneeded, we seem to differ entirely. We need to gain staff, not remove it.

That’s all I’m bothered to typing right now.

Read full topic
item.source: Staff & unneeded staff on our website
